Message: New ABAP sources for Z_XTRACT_IS_TABLE_COMPRESSION to improve performance especially on SAP system based on MAXDB. New function module Z_XTRACT_IS_TABLE_JOIN released as beta version.
Updated logic to autosize table field widths.
Updated selection logic of output field list to highlight moving fields.
Updated logic to autosize table field columns in designer surface.
Updated internal table join structure handling.
Updated table join structure to handle alias field names in extraction results.
Updated keyboard and selection handling in table lookup dialog and within the table field list (return selection).
Updated keyboard and selection handling in table lookup dialog.
